channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump sued by Central Park Five for defamation over claims made during Harris debate
item.description: Donald Trump was previously successfully sued for defamation by the writer E. Jean Carroll in connection with her claim that he raped her.

item.title: Chick-fil-A rolls out its streaming service, an entertainment app with shows and podcasts
item.description: Chick-Fil-A Play will launch on Nov. 18.

item.title: North Dakota voters could end property taxes — and intensify a tax revolt
Gold soars to record high on Middle East jitters, U.S. election
item.description: Up roughly 30% in the past year, the metal has attracted a growing chorus of experts who believe its rise will continue long-term.

item.title: Boeing shares rise on tentative labor pact with union
Bank stocks are trouncing the market in October on Trump optimism
item.description: "A Republican win would likely be viewed most positive for bank stocks," a Bank of America analyst said.

item.title: Mark Cuban says 'It's the Harris campaign vs. Elon,' not Trump
item.description: Mark Cuban discussed Elon Musk and Donald Trump while advocating for Kamala Harris as a more pro-business presidential candidate.

item.title: AMD’s stock stands out from other AI names. What that may say about the market.
The market could get hit hard on a Harris win — but also drop on a Trump victory
GE HealthCare announces time-saving AI tool for doctors who treat cancer
item.description: GE HealthCare announced a new artificial intelligence application it said will save time for doctors who diagnose and treat cancer.

item.title: KKM Financial's Essential 40 stock fund is now an ETF
item.description: Many asset managers have been converting their mutual funds to ETFs in recent years, due in part to a 2019 SEC rule change.

item.title: Gen Z is making casseroles go viral on TikTok, and inflation’s to blame
item.description: It turns out casseroles offer more than just nostalgia - they're incredibly practical, budget friendly and versatile, which is exactly what today's ho...

item.title: I tried the new $50 Loop Dream earplugs and woke up refreshed after 7 uninterrupted hours of sleep
item.description: The slightest noise can interrupt my dreams. Could these tiny silicone earplugs be the answer?

item.title: Jensen Huang and Mark Zuckerberg each got $76 billion richer this year—equal to Spotify’s market cap
item.description: The increase in their wealth also exceeds the entire market cap of CVS, Target, and Capital One.

item.title: U.S. exceptionalism is now driving markets — if this jinx can be avoided
